blocks.title: Services & tech
blocks.subtitle: Web Designer | Web Developer | SEO
blocks.text: As a professional freelancer specialized in professional web design, SEO, and web development, I create state-of-the-art digital solutions with a focus on your needs. Examples are: regular business websites, applications for administrative purposes (e.g. selecting personnel for certain tasks), webshops, food delivery web applications, CRMs, and more. In other words: anything that needs to appear on the screen to increase your business' efficiency and/or attract more users, ultimately generating more revenue.

img.alt: Workstation with 2 monitors and a keyboard.

blocks.title: My Services
blocks.subtitle: What I Offer
blocks.text:
Comprehensive digital solutions tailored to your business needs. From beautiful designs to advanced development. It doesn't matter if you're looking for an affordable web designer or a true software developer, you've come to the right place.

In short: a digital solution to save you time, costs, and increase your profit.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: Beautiful, modern, and user-friendly website designs that leave a lasting impression on your visitors and perfectly represent your brand.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Custom web solutions built with the latest technologies to ensure your website is fast, secure, and scalable.

services.title: SEO Optimization
services.description: Improve your visibility in search engines and attract more organic traffic with comprehensive SEO strategies.

services.title: Graphic Design
services.description: Eye-catching visuals and branding elements that enhance your website's appeal and strengthen your brand identity.

services.title: E-commerce
services.description: Full-featured online stores that make selling your products online easy, secure, and profitable.

services.title: Automation Systems
services.description: Custom automation solutions to streamline your business processes, save time, and reduce operational costs.

blocks.title: Projects
blocks.text: Get inspired by completed projects: from sleek business websites to advanced web applications. With an eye for optimal speed and SEO, ensuring your online success is guaranteed.

blocks.title: Price Subscription
blocks.subtitle: Affordable Web Designer & Developer
blocks.text:
Discover a transparent and simple pricing strategy for web development. Starting from just €74 per month, you get a standard, professional business website including numerous benefits, without hidden costs. The price varies slightly depending on the complexity and scope of your specific project.

In addition to a professional business website, you receive lifetime free hosting, domain name, maintenance, updates, and more to save time and costs! Let me handle all administrative tasks, so you can fully focus on the growth of your business.

See an example of a business website developed for a construction company.

items.title: Professional, business website
items.details: Naturally, you get a website with a professional and business-like appearance essential for your company image. Your website standardly includes: a navigation menu with links, introduction, footer with social media links and company details, contact and/or quote form, about us section, services overview, project gallery, and FAQ (frequently asked questions) section. Extra functionality such as a reservation system is possible for a small additional fee. Of course, you can also choose which sections you want on your website yourself.

items.title: Excellent display on all devices
items.details: Your website will look good on all devices such as smartphones, tablets, and computers.

items.title: Lifetime FREE hosting
items.details: You never have to pay for hosting. I handle everything for you. Hosting: placing your website online.

items.title: Lifetime FREE domain name
items.details: You never have to pay for a domain name. I handle everything for you. Domain name: your website address (e.g., www.yourcompany.com)

items.title: Lifetime FREE maintenance and updates
items.details: I always ensure your website is and remains up-to-date so it always functions excellently. You don't have to worry about updates or maintenance.

items.title: Excellent SEO on your website, FREE
items.details: I ensure your website ranks well in Google so you get more visitors. SEO: search engine optimization. This is important for your website to be found in Google and other search engines.

items.title: FREE logos
items.details: You read that right! With a subscription, you receive a free logo from my collection, fully tailored to your wishes. And you can have as many as you want.

items.title: Administration & invoices handled by me
items.details: I handle all administration and invoicing for you, such as the website, hosting, and domain name. You don't have to worry about anything.

items.title: 24/7 support
items.details: Do you have questions or comments? You can always contact me. I'm happy to help you further at no cost.

items.title: Pay annually? No startup costs!
items.details: Yup, you read that right! No startup costs with annual payment. You only pay for the subscription itself.

items.title: Not satisfied? 30-day money back
items.details: Are you not satisfied? No problem, you get your money back within 30 days.

blocks.title: Blogs
blocks.text: Discover insights and practical tips about IT, development, web design, and freelancing. Stay updated on trends and get inspiration to grow your projects and boost your career.

blocks.title: Frequently Asked Questions
blocks.subtitle: Questions & Answers
blocks.text: Below you will find a list of frequently asked questions about web development and business websites. If you have another question, do not hesitate to contact me.

items.title: What does it cost to have a business website created?
items.description: The price for a business website varies greatly, depending on the complexity, desired functionalities, and the experience of the web designer. With me, you only pay €79 excl. VAT per month, or €74 per month with an annual subscription for a professional business website. For more complex projects with extensive functionalities, the costs are higher. Every subscription includes valuable benefits such as free domain name, hosting, maintenance, and personal support. Everything you need for a worry-free online presence.

items.title: How long does it take to create a website?
items.description: The time needed to create a website depends on the complexity and specific requirements. With me, you can count on a turnaround time of about 5 days for a standard business website. For more complex projects, this may take longer, but I will always keep you informed of the progress.

items.title: How much are the startup costs?
items.description: If you opt for an annual subscription of €74 per month, you pay no startup costs. If you opt for a monthly subscription, you pay a one-time fee depending on the complexity and size of the project.

items.title: What is SEO?
items.description: SEO stands for search engine optimization. It is the process of improving the quality and quantity of website traffic to a website or web page from search engines. SEO focuses on unpaid results rather than direct traffic or paid traffic. This is something I standardly incorporate into my websites.

items.title: What is a domain name?
items.description: A domain name is a unique name used to identify an IP address on the internet. A domain name is an address that allows people to find your website on the internet. I arrange the domain name for you and cover the costs. You don't have to worry about this.

items.title: What is hosting?
items.description: Web hosting is a service that offers businesses and individuals the ability to place their website or web page on the internet. A web host, or web hosting service provider, is a company that provides the technologies and services needed for the website or web page to be viewed on the internet. I arrange the hosting for you and cover the costs. You don't have to worry about this.

blocks.title: Contact
blocks.text: Do you have questions or are you interested in a business website or a custom web application to grow your business? Contact me today!
